Texts.Eng:
A Small, social, and overly cute reality-bending dinosaur-like things. They imagine, and reality follows suit.

Diet: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
(Built-In)Small Profile (3 blocks tall)
+^green;10^reset;% Energy, 
Resist: +^green;20^reset;% Cold, Fire, Poison, +^green;40^reset;% Radioactive, Cosmic 
Immune: Breath, L3 Radiation
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:
-^red;20^reset;% Health and Energy Regen on Atropus biomes
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
Wands: +^green;5^reset;% Damage and Protection
Staves: +^green;10^reset;% Damage and Protection
 
^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
-^red;10^reset;% Electric, -^red;50^reset;% Shadow, -^red;20^reset;% Physical Resistance. 
-^red;20^reset;% Health
